mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, P.pno, P.pregdate, P.pname, P.pdetail, P.uno, U.uname, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P LEFT JOIN Label L ON P.lno = L.lno LEFT JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN ProjectMemberStat S ON S.pno = P.pno WHERE S.stat=001 AND S.uno=#{uno} OR P.uno=#{uno} GROUP BY P.pno

SELECT pno, pname, pdetail, pdata, pregdate, pduedate, U.uname, C.CODE_NAME AS udepartment, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P, User U, Label L, CodeTable C WHERE pno=#{pno} AND P.uno = U.uno AND P.lno = L.lno AND C.CODE_TYPE='002' AND C.CODE=U.udepartment

SELECT P.pno, P.pname, P.pdetail, P.uno, U.uname FROM Project P LEFT JOIN ProjectMemberStat S ON S.pno = P.pno JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno WHERE
P.pname like #{item} '%' AND
(S.stat=001 AND S.uno=#{uno} OR P.uno=#{uno})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Milestones WHERE pno=#{pno} AND mstatement=001
